name: Color Squares (Beta)
description:
Have you ever wanted to needlessly stamp colored squares on a black background?

Well, now you can!

With a frustrating dependency on both Python and Pygame (for now)  this is an annoying game with no reason to be installed. 

(But just in case you want to anyway, download Python from the website, then make sure to add "pip" during installation. Then after you can go to the command line and type "pip install Pygame", and now you have all dependencies installed. Yay.)
